channel.title: Project-Midnight PI|| Double exp weekends!||Torva, Penix, Virtus
channel.description:
[size=18pt]DO NOT ASK FOR STAFF, JUST PLAY THE SERVER AND WE WILL NOTICE AND CONSIDER[/size]
Download Link: http://www.mediafire.com/?z3a0tgegrj6iabm
Forums: http://project-midnight.webs.com/
We are a server that is dedicated to having fun. Me(midnight) as an owner tries to listen to the community and try to make it more enjoyable for the players. Also im a very active owner which is a plus. We have double exp weekends every weekend and i would say the server is up 95% of the time until we get a vps. Thats just a little about us, also we may be adding some weekly events in the future or maybe some new bosses very soon. so give us a try today! enjoy the server(:
What we have: - curses - pkbox - funpk - staffzone - donorzone - dicing(Donor+) - working godsword and claws spec - working overloads - torva, pernix, virtus - PVP Armour and Weapons - chaotics - primal armour - spirit shields - working donator lamp(tradable) - donator cape - working sled! - working crystal key(rare drop, use on chest at home get random item, or vote for 3 keys) - decent rates - double exp weekends - elegant shop for those skillers! - working duel arena - working gwd(click on npcs to get places) - tormented demons - KBD - corporal beast - sigils(must get blessed spirit shield from store and add sigil) - good staff members - and much much more!
RECENT UPDATES: - added slash bash in wild - fixed pking teleports -
Now for some pictures :D
Corporal Beast [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/epoppw.jpg[/img]
Donator store [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/156thm1.jpg[/img]
FunPk [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/15q8b2d.jpg[/img]
Home And Login Message/Alert [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/155l83b.jpg[/img]
PkBox [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/3092gja.jpg[/img]
PKP Store [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/30djp14.jpg[/img]
PKP Store 2 [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/20gfxc1.jpg[/img]
Prayers [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2use5bp.jpg[/img]
Dicing [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/34xq60z.jpg[/img]
Rules [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2i7lpuf.jpg[/img]
Slash Bash! [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/331qdli.jpg[/img]
